TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content:
> 
> For the 1TB hard drive on my laptop, I lost of the 750GB stored, 325GB\'s.

Did you lose anything you spent more then a week on?

> 
> Did you lose anything you spent more then a week on?

2/3rds of it. Lost all my browsing history as well...

> 
> 2/3rds of it. Lost all my browsing history as well...

Ouch.
Tis fine. Got a backup of two weeks ago, with most of my personal data (thank god). Trust me, it would take me a week to rebuild all that information.

> 
> I\'d recommend Radion to overlook you due to the trust you at least have with me from the time of the RP.
> 
> I also hold some of your land, if you came here and became a grand-duke of it, we could find a way to invade and annex 50% of mincespy\'s weird claim.
> 
> (That would create some fun right off the bat)

History got reset, so you have no claim there. This problem also kept me awake until about 1am, after which I\'ve decided not to move my land.

(and also, aren\'t victories fun and easy when you have three free mercenaries fighting for you?)

EDIT: I won\'t be on for the rest of today, but I\'ve had a different idea. Perhaps we can still begotiate peace when I come back tomorrow.

07:42

Site still down.
One day, I will find where all these spam bots come down and destroy every one ever. But until that day comes, we have to live with this.

> 
> History got reset, so you have no claim there. This problem also kept me awake until about 1am, after which I\'ve decided not to move my land.
> 
> (and also, aren\'t victories fun and easy when you have three free mercenaries fighting for you?)
> 
> (and to think that originally I wanted an alliance)

That\'s a bit late, ain\'t it? Your land is pretty small now.

> 
> One day, I will find where all these spam bots come down and destroy every one ever. But until that day comes, we have to live with this.

They come in massive quantities from China and Nigeria, good luck hunting, see you in 100 years.

> 
> That\'s a bit late, ain\'t it? Your land is pretty small now.

What do you mean?

Also, look at my edit. Won\'t be on for the rest of today.

> 
> What do you mean?
> 
> Also, look at my edit. Won\'t be on for the rest of today.

Well, i know your personality, so i got your name on a treaty now, you\'re past the point of \'\'no wait, i don\'t want to do this!\'\'

> 
> Well, i know your personality, so i got your name on a treaty now, you\'re past the point of \'\'no wait, i don\'t want to do this!\'\'

See: Treaty of Vestallies.

(Joke is, nations *may* ignore treaties. Besides, the removal reason in the treaty involves OOC things, which were reset. It seriously breaks the treaty thing.)

> 
> See: Treaty of Vestallies.
> 
> (Joke is, nations *may* ignore treaties. Besides, the removal reason in the treaty involves OOC things, which were reset. It seriously breaks the treaty thing.)

There is no such thing as a treaty of Vestallies.

Did you mean Versailles? If you did, what does that make mince in comparison to the real world?

> 
> There is no such thing as a treaty of Vestallies.
> 
> Did you mean Versailles? If you did, what does that make mince in comparison to the real world?

Spelling error, like usual. I hate the T.

And I made the comparison only because a nation violated a treaty, and it was the one I had on my mind. (That, and the violations lead to a bloodbath, which made it even more obvious)

> 
> Yup. COld was, nukes, colonies, space race, I started the KSP\'s version of the Dark Brotherhood etc.

I started the KSP version of Switzerland... with a twist

> 
> Spelling error, like usual. I hate the T.
> 
> And I made the comparison only because a nation violated a treaty, and it was the one I had on my mind. (That, and the violations lead to a bloodbath, which made it even more obvious)

Well, if this is the 50\'s, then people would be well aware what it means to violate such a treaty.

My RAM arrived today.

Funny, that I have the RAM but because of the computer screw up between Barclays, Natwest and Ulster Bank, my balance was still Â£45 before I put Â£10 in today. But that will be sorted out soon enough.

> 
> Which one did you apply for?

For the new site? Radion only said ' 72 ' And I don\'t know if that\'s good or not.
Seems things are running again now.

RP go down for anyone else just now?

My computer is derping out, but I want to see how badly, so this might have been just my computer proceeding to derp again...

Yup. Got \'server too busy\' messages for a few minutes, then just \'cannot connect to server\'. 

FAKE EDIT: Resolved while writing this.

Yeah, I\'m back on.

This server isn\'t the greatest of all time, but it\'s hanging on, and it works, and I\'m not going to complain.
Anyway. I\'m leaving the RP now, you can delete my nation, corp and projects.
Well, it won\'t load again.
Use [tor](https://www.torproject.org/).

> 
> Use [tor](https://www.torproject.org/).

Not on iOS.

EDIT: Got a new web browser, moving on.
